article_title: Obama to colleges: skip the gourmet food, fancy gyms
article_text: President Barack Obama criticized university administrators Friday, saying they’d driven up the cost of college with high-priced extras such as gourmet food and lush fitness centers.

article_metadata.title: Obama to colleges: skip the gourmet food, fancy gyms | McClatchy DC
